title: Person Name

alias.description: Another name that the person is known by. This might be a nickname, former name, or a name that the person is also known as (aka).

fullNameAlias.description: The full name of the person

firstNameAlias.description: The first name of the person; this may consist of more than one word

givenNamesAlias.description: The parts of the full name that preceed the last name

lastNameAlias.description: The last name of the person; this may consist of more than one word

middleNamesAlias.description: Middle or additional names supplied between the First name and Last name, separated by spaces
